title: Kinda Funny: The Animated Series Ep. 14 - "The Halloween Episode"
description:

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Tim Gettys, and Nick Scarpino talk about the biggest stories in nerd culture.

transcript_chunks.text: the funny goes to school they've got their crew they are so cool looking out for each other except for Kevin Sabri dude this game all the Greggy the pride of hyung producers through surrender pure want to there's nothing they can't do fine trucker nice to see you excellent choice in costume very historically accurate Shawn good to see you're still getting out there on the mountain trails old man fitness first Anthony I see you come dressed as Han Solo from the popular film franchise Star Wars a bit obvious if I do say so myself hey I'll take that from you I Saved by the Bell you'll excuse me boring conversation anyway hey Drucker you want to sing some Broadway rap rap with me do I is that DiGiorno's pizza I smell out of the way libertarian Papa needs his medicine hey Colin it's me Greg you probably didn't recognize me with the eye patch it's certainly threw off grandma Miller she kept want to talk to me about her cataract surgery I don't think it worked

hey Colin it's me Greg you probably didn't recognize me with the eye patch it's certainly threw off grandma Miller she kept want to talk to me about her cataract surgery I don't think it worked she keeps bumping into things and farty what is this some kind of joke what why are you wearing that costume you know I dress like Megaman every year for Halloween and most Sunday's who put you up to this was it the DNC again I needed a last-minute costume so I pick one up on Amazon Prime what's the big deal ah here we go an authentic Megaman costume is not something you just pick up on Amazon Prime the franchise is widely regarded as a masterpiece worthy of the highest respect and praise okay it's on the top ten list of Presidents and billionaires in an interview with Forbes magazine Warren Buffett was quoted as saying that the only thing he wished he'd done more in life than make money is play Megaman was Warren Buffett the eighth or a ninth president Keiji Inafune he worked for 900 days

was quoted as saying that the only thing he wished he'd done more in life than make money is play Megaman was Warren Buffett the eighth or a ninth president Keiji Inafune he worked for 900 days straight on the first Megaman he didn't even stop these to combat his mortal need for rest Inafune a son developed a revolutionary method of sleep coding that Cliff Bleszinski still uses to this day so the day the first Megaman cartridge hit store shelves people reported seeing literal angels flying high above the Capcom Japan offices write it Colin let me take a crack at this if you must I think he's making the point that a lot of people kay jana pune included worked really hard to make Megaman following so far in a ton more people who played it really liked it a whole lot you're making really good points so on some level the fact that you randomly picked a Mega Man costume out of the bargain bid on Amazon Prime without knowing anything about the franchise is long and decorated legacy could be

points so on some level the fact that you randomly picked a Mega Man costume out of the bargain bid on Amazon Prime without knowing anything about the franchise is long and decorated legacy could be considered a tad messed up right but it was free shipping mmm you got you there yeah that pretty much trumps all my points that's it take that costume off this instant I'd rather not man this thing cost me like five bucks can I at least wear it until we get a picture up on the gram that's it I've had it you've left me with no other choice he's gonna challenge them to a speedrun I'm challenging you to a speed one does that mean we get to come inside yes great challenge accepted this match will be a one round elimination speedrun the person with the fastest time wins loser must forfeit his Halloween costume Colin won the coin toss he gets to go first that my friend is exactly what I intend to do when I finish chewing you may begin Ready Set begin holy cannoli he just beat the game in

costume Colin won the coin toss he gets to go first that my friend is exactly what I intend to do when I finish chewing you may begin Ready Set begin holy cannoli he just beat the game in a minute and 37 seconds that's 7 minutes faster than the world record not my best time but it should do well the controller is all yours yeah I'm not doing that you can have the costume what dude I think I played Megaman like one time and I couldn't even figure out how to make the dog a hoverboard here it means way more to you than it will ever be I respect you for saying that maybe I was a bit brash in my assessment of the situation you know what we can both be Mega Man tonight that's okay I actually had Kevin ordered me a different costume on Amazon Prime it should be here any minute Nick your new costumes here it's crazy how they always seem to only have one left in my size and it's like winning the lottery every time I order anything god damn it you
